## ArrayMatrix.forEach() method

Executes the `callback` function for each entry in the matrix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEach(cb: MatrixEntryCallback<S>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | <code>MatrixEntryCallback&lt;S&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
